data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gaimari, Stephen D. (2012): A new genus and species of Chamaemyiidae (Diptera: Lauxanioidea) from South America feeding on Ceroplastes wax scales (Hemiptera: Coccidae), and status of the genus Ortalidina as a chamaemyiid. Zootaxa 3342: 39-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211348
